data.prompt:
Magic: The Gathering card art.

Final Prompt: "A sleek, nimble outrigger star-skiff, carved from cosmic wood and embellished with intricate tribal designs, glides gracefully through a swirling, bioluminescent coral nebula. A lone Wayfinder, their glowing tattoos hinting at ancestral guidance, stands at the helm, intently scanning the vast expanse of stars and distant volcanic island-worlds ahead. The aesthetic is a vibrant fusion of ancient Polynesian culture and interstellar exploration."

Artist Credit: inspired by Kekai Kotaki

Style: Fantasy illustration, detailed, painterly, dramatic lighting.
Do NOT include any text, card frames, or UI elements.
Focus on the subject matter only.
